title: Reinforced light coloured thermoplastic moulding compositions.
abstract: Thermoplastic moulding compositions containing A) 10-91.9% by weight of a thermoplastic polymer, B) 7-60% by weight of reinforcing filler, C) 0.1-40% by weight of titanium dioxide and D) 1-40% by weight of a rubber.

methods: Combine thermoplastic polymer, reinforcing filler, titanium dioxide, and rubber to create a moulding composition.
llama_json.research_subject: Reinforced light coloured thermoplastic moulding compositions

motivations: There is a need for improved thermoplastic moulding compositions with enhanced properties.
objectives: To create a thermoplastic moulding composition containing specific proportions of a thermoplastic polymer, reinforcing filler, titanium dioxide, and rubber.
methods: Formulate a thermoplastic moulding composition with specific percentages by weight of a thermoplastic polymer, reinforcing filler, titanium dioxide, and rubber.
results: A new thermoplastic moulding composition with potentially improved properties.
openai_json.research_subject: Reinforced light coloured thermoplastic moulding compositions

motivations: There is a need for thermoplastic materials that combine reinforcement properties with light coloration for various applications.
objectives: Develop thermoplastic moulding compositions that incorporate reinforcing fillers while maintaining light coloration through titanium dioxide addition.
methods: Combine thermoplastic polymers with reinforcing fillers, titanium dioxide, and rubber in specific proportions to create moulding compositions.
results: Light colored thermoplastic compositions with enhanced mechanical properties suitable for moulding applications.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Reinforced light colored thermoplastic moulding compositions
